name: QjackCtl
summary: JACK Audio Connection Kit Qt GUI Interface
description: JACK Audio Connection Kit - Qt GUI Interface: A simple Qt application to control the JACK server. Written in C++ around the Qt framework for X11, most exclusively using Qt Designer. Provides a simple GUI dialog for setting several JACK server parameters, which are properly saved between sessions, and a way control of the status of the audio server. With time, this primordial interface has become richer by including a enhanced patchbay and connection control features.
